00034 LibraryComponent::LibraryComponent(QDomDocument &doc):
00035 vlnv_(), 
00036 description_(),
00037 kactus2Attributes_() {
00038 
00039         // get the VLNV
00040         vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV(findVLNV(doc)));
00041 
00042         // find the IP-Xact root element (spirit:component or spirit:design ...)
00043         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00044         int i = 0;
00045         // search for the first element with children (=document type)
00046         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00047                 ++i;
00048         }
00049 
00050         QDomNodeList children = doc.childNodes().item(i).childNodes();
00051 
00052         for (int i = 0; i < children.size(); ++i) {
00053 
00054                 // get the description
00055                 if (children.at(i).nodeName() ==
00056                                 QString("spirit:description")) {
00057                         description_ = children.at(i).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue();
00058                 }
00059         }
00060         return;
00061 }

00069         vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV());
00070 }

00079 LibraryComponent::LibraryComponent( const LibraryComponent &other ):
00080 vlnv_(),
00081 description_(other.description_),
00082 kactus2Attributes_(other.kactus2Attributes_) {
00083 
00084         if (other.vlnv_) {
00085                 vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV(*other.vlnv_));
00086         }
00087         else
00088                 vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV());

00091 LibraryComponent & LibraryComponent::operator=( const LibraryComponent &other ) {
00092         if (this != &other) {
00093 
00094                 if (other.vlnv_) {
00095                         vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV(*other.vlnv_));
00096                 }
00097                 else
00098                         vlnv_ = QSharedPointer<VLNV>(new VLNV());
00099 
00100                 description_ = other.description_;
00101 
00102                 kactus2Attributes_ = other.kactus2Attributes_;
00103         }
00104         return *this;

00110 VLNV LibraryComponent::findVLNV(QDomDocument &doc) {
00111         // first the correct element is searched for by its name
00112         // and then the child of the element (which is the text element that holds
00113         // the value of the element) is added to the struct
00114 
00115         // get the type of the document
00116         QDomNodeList nodeList = doc.childNodes();
00117         // search for the first element with children
00118         int i = 0;
00119         while (!nodeList.at(i).hasChildNodes()) {
00120                 ++i;
00121         }
00122 
00123         QString type(nodeList.at(i).nodeName());
00124         type = General::removeWhiteSpace(type);
00125 
00126         // the vendor information
00127         QDomNodeList vendorList = doc.elementsByTagName(SPIRIT_VENDOR);
00128         QString vendor(vendorList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue());
00129         vendor = General::removeWhiteSpace(vendor);
00130 
00131         // the library information
00132         QDomNodeList libraryList = doc.elementsByTagName(SPIRIT_LIBRARY);
00133         QString library(libraryList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue());
00134         library = General::removeWhiteSpace(library);
00135 
00136         // The name information
00137         QDomNodeList nameList = doc.elementsByTagName(SPIRIT_NAME);
00138         QString name(nameList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue());
00139         name = General::removeWhiteSpace(name);
00140 
00141         // The version information
00142         QDomNodeList versionList = doc.elementsByTagName(SPIRIT_VERSION);
00143         QString version(versionList.item(0).childNodes().item(0).nodeValue());
00144         version = General::removeWhiteSpace(version);
00145 
00146         // if one of the mandatory elements is missing then throw exception
00147         if (type.isNull() || vendor.isNull() || library.isNull() ||
00148                         name.isNull() || version.isNull()) {
00149                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Invalid VLNV found for the document"));
00150         }
00151 
00152         return VLNV(type, vendor, library, name, version);
00153 }

00172 void LibraryComponent::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00173         writer.writeStartDocument();
00174 
00175         // create a string to set as a comment to the top of the document
00176         QString topComment(QObject::tr("Created by Kactus 2 document generator "));
00177 
00178         // comment contains the creation date and time
00179         topComment += QTime::currentTime().toString(QString("hh:mm:ss")) += QString(" ");
00180         topComment += QDate::currentDate().toString(QString("dd.MM.yyyy"));
00181         writer.writeComment(topComment);
00182 
00183         // the comment has been generated to the top of the document and we can
00184         // write the actual data
00185 
00186         // write the element that specifies the type of the document
00187         writer.writeStartElement(vlnv_->getTypestr());
00188 
00189         // dont close the elements because the child class will now write the
00190         // document-type specific info into document and will take care of closing
00191         // the open elements
00192         return;
00193 }
00194 
00195 void LibraryComponent::writeVLNV(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00196         // write the VLNV info
00197         writer.writeTextElement(SPIRIT_VENDOR,
00198                         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->getVendor());
00199         writer.writeTextElement(SPIRIT_LIBRARY,
00200                         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->getLibrary());
00201         writer.writeTextElement(SPIRIT_NAME,
00202                         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->getName());
00203         writer.writeTextElement(SPIRIT_VERSION,
00204                         LibraryComponent::vlnv_->getVersion());
00205 }

00207 void LibraryComponent::writeKactus2Attributes( QXmlStreamWriter& writer ) {
00208         writer.writeStartElement("kactus2:kts_attributes");
00209         
00210         // write the attribute describing the product hierarchy
00211         if (kactus2Attributes_.contains("kts_productHier")) {
00212                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:kts_productHier", 
00213                         kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_productHier"));
00214         }
00215 
00216         // write the implementation attribute
00217         bool wasSoftware = false;
00218         if (kactus2Attributes_.contains("kts_implementation")) {
00219 
00220                 // if this is defined as software
00221                 if (kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_implementation") == "SW") {
00222                         wasSoftware = true;
00223                 }
00224 
00225                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:kts_implementation", 
00226                         kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_implementation"));
00227         }
00228 
00229         // if was software but the software type is not defined
00230         if (wasSoftware && !kactus2Attributes_.contains("kts_sw_type")) {
00231                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Software type must be specified for software"));
00232         }
00233         // if was software and software type is defined
00234         else if (wasSoftware) {
00235                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:kts_sw_type", kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_sw_type"));
00236         }
00237 
00238         // if firmness is defined
00239         if (kactus2Attributes_.contains("kts_firmness")) {
00240                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:kts_firmness",
00241                         kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_firmness"));
00242         }
00243 
00244         // if bus def type is defined
00245         if (kactus2Attributes_.contains("kts_busdef_type")) {
00246                 writer.writeTextElement("kactus2:kts_busdef_type",
00247                         kactus2Attributes_.value("kts_busdef_type"));
00248         }
00249 
00250         writer.writeEndElement(); // kactus2:kts_attributes
00251 }
00252 
00253 void LibraryComponent::parseKactus2Attributes( QDomNode& attributeNode ) {
00254         
00255         // used to check that if one is found then both must be found.
00256         bool wasSoftware = false;
00257         bool hadSoftwareType = false;
00258 
00259         // go through all the child nodes of the fileNode
00260         for (int i = 0; i < attributeNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00261                 QDomNode tempNode = attributeNode.childNodes().at(i);
00262 
00263                 // temporary variables to store the attribute name and value
00264                 QString attName;
00265                 QString attValue;
00266 
00267                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:kts_productHier") {
00268                         kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_productHier", tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00269                 }
00270                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:kts_implementation") {
00271                         QString value = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00272                         kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_implementation", value);
00273 
00274                         // if implementation was defined as software
00275                         if (value == "SW")
00276                                 wasSoftware = true;
00277                 }
00278                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:kts_sw_type") {
00279                         kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_sw_type", tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00280                         hadSoftwareType = true;
00281                 }
00282                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:kts_firmness") {
00283                         kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_firmness", tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00284                 }
00285                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == "kactus2:kts_busdef_type") {
00286                         kactus2Attributes_.insert("kts_busdef_type", tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00287                 }
00288         }
00289 
00290         // if this was software then the software type must also be defined.
00291         if (wasSoftware != hadSoftwareType) {
00292                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Software type must be defined if "
00293                         "implementation is set as software"));
00294         }
00295 
00296         return;
00297 }

00299 void LibraryComponent::setXMLNameSpaceAttributes( QMap<QString, QString>& attributes ) {
00300 
00301         attributes.clear();
00302         attributes.insert("xmlns:spirit", "http://www.spiritconsortium.org/XMLSchema/SPIRIT/1.5");
00303         attributes.insert("xmlns:xsi", "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance");
00304         attributes.insert("xsi:schemaLocation", "http://www.spiritconsortium.org/XMLSchema/"
00305                 "SPIRIT/1.5 http://www.spiritconsortium.org/XMLSchema/SPIRIT/1.5/index.xsd");
00306         attributes.insert("xmlns:kactus2", "http://funbase.cs.tut.fi/");
00307 }
